#summary Shows at a high level the number of checkins/checkouts as well as the number of free beds available for a given day.

= Details =

After selecting a date (only one day at a time), the tables showing the checkins/checkouts by room automatically update.

Following that is a table showing the number of free beds available again broken down by group/room number.

This is a read-only page. No change can be made on this screen.
